name: United We Stand
description:
CO-OP IS KING

Prepare yourself to die a lot if you don't cooperate!

United we Stand is a 2-4 players horde-bullet-hell challenge.

Timing, positioning, strategy, and a good aim will rise your team to the top!

BUILD YOUR CHARACTER

When you kill a Boss, it drops a random Defensive, Offensive or Ultimate ability.

Learn how abilities work together, and create the perfect builds!

FREE NEW CONTENT

We strongly believe in long-lasting game development, where games evolve for gamers, not for profit.

You can expect new abilities, heroes, maps, enemies, bananas... We will keep updating the game as long as you ask for it!
